vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of Pemberton Hill Road from South Great Trinity Forest Way to Lake June Road - Estrada Concrete Company, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $10,681,280.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($8,602,180.00), Water Capital Construction Fund ($83,750.00), Water Capital Improvement D Fund ($1,120,460.00), Wastewater Capital Construction Fund ($24,900.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement E Fund ($849,990.00)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of Pemberton Hill Road from South Great Trinity Forest Way to Lake June Road - Estrada Concrete Company, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $10,681,280.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($8,602,180.00), Water Capital Construction Fund ($83,750.00), Water Capital Improvement D Fund ($1,120,460.00), Wastewater Capital Construction Fund ($24,900.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement E Fund ($849,990.00)
